jd: From: Santhoshi, HAN IT Staffing santhoshi@hanstaffing.com Reply to: santhoshi@hanstaffing.com Role : QA Consolidation Python BDD (Data Consistency) - OnsiteLocation: FIFTH AVE ,NYC Client : Capgemini JOB DESCRIPTION:"C1 - Python BDD (Data Consistency)Detailed Job Description : 5-8 years of experience in Python AutomationHands on experience in Data Consistency and Data Quality Automation testingShould have deep hand on experience in Pytest BDD frameworkShould have hands on experice on any SQL languageStrong experience in development, execution , maintenance and analyzing automated testingStrong Knowledge of building automation frameworks from scratchMust have experience in implementing automation solutions within an Agile development lifecycle.Experience working in CI/CD environments using tools like TeamCity/JenkinsMust have strong analytical and creative problem-solving skillsMust be able work independently for any given taskExcellent leadership and communication skillsGood to have Stakeholders management and Leading Team"
